snippet: Investors were heartened by the Russian president’s speech to the Russian Parliament.
abstract: Stocks rise, buoyed by encouraging economic news and by investor expectations that conflict between Russia and West will not escalate further.
lead_paragraph: Investors were heartened by the Russian president’s speech to the Russian Parliament.

headline.main: Economic Data Gives Shares a Lift
headline.print_headline: Economic Data Gives Shares a Lift
